steps.title: License Server Overview
steps.content: You can see the current status of the license server at a glance.

steps.title: Logo (Link)
steps.content: You can use the logo to navigate back to the main screen.

steps.title: Server Version
steps.content: License server version is displayed here. It is a good idea to keep it up-to-date.

steps.title: Machine Name
steps.content: This is the name of the license server machine. It defaults to the machine hostname but you can change it by clicking on it.

steps.title: Online service
steps.content:
This indicator shows the state of the online licensing service:

- The online licensing service is up and running.

- This license server is not connected to V-Ray's main license server.

- Online licensing service is disabled.

steps.title: Offline service
steps.content:
This indicator shows the state of the borrowed licenses:

- You have borrowed licenses for offline usage.

- You have not borrowed licenses for offline usage.

steps.title: Dongle
steps.content:
This indicator shows the state of the dongle licensing service:

- Dongle licensing service is up and running and dongle is connected.

- Dongle licensing service is enabled but a dongle is not connected.

- Dongle licensing service is disabled.

steps.title: Product List
steps.content: All your licensed products are displayed here. Click on a product to see detailed information about available licenses and current usage.
